remarks: If there is no distance between ` A ` and ` B ` , then ` A = B ` . Axiom A3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 10.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jun-2013.)
statement: axcgrid $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( <. A , B >. Cgr <. C , C >. -> A = B ) ) $.
